extendedInfo.description: Access our support site: http://amazonpricedrop.dyndns.pro/wordpress/How many times have you missed the suddenly price drop on amazon? Can you afford to miss them again? This is the tool you would need to trace amazon price, so you would not lose your big deal again.The most accurate Amazon price tracker comparing to any other Amazon price tracking apps.Support price tracking for Amazon, Walmart, Target and eBayYou can get noticed when price is below your alerting line or out of stock item get availableYou can monitor price change by dragging the build in Amazon price dashboard widget to your home screen.You also can monitor Amazon lightning deal from the price widget.The tracked highest and lowest price are also shown in the widget.All Amazon sites like US, UK, FR, DE, CN, JP, CA and ES are supported.If the tool works for you, please give it 5 star. If not, let me know. I appreciate your help to keep improving this tool!

reviews.title: Savings to be had
reviews.comment: Tells me when I can swoop items @ lower prices offered on Amazon. They\'re prices are already very competitive.
reviews.author: skufn ljdnf

reviews.title: Awesome app, probably saved me over \302\243100 so far.
reviews.comment: Awesome app for Amazon UK. Saved me lots (especially good if you are prepared to wait a couple of weeks before making a purchase) Set the default refresh to longer than 10 mins in options if on a restricted data plan. Or run on a tablet on wifi rather than on a phone. Best purchase so far, S. A. D lamp at \302\243139 reduced to \302\24380, app alerted me, bought with \302\24360 saving before Amazon put the price back up within 24 hours.
reviews.author: GtB Films

reviews.title: Be careful
reviews.comment: This crap app consumed 650mb of my data plan in 7 days. Default 10min interval is to blame I guess.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fails on Ebay
reviews.comment: I already use Camel for Amazon price tracking. What I really need is something for eBay, so was happy to see the icon. However, all searches - even trivially-simple ones like \'wifi\' - fail to return results. Until fixed, app is useless to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What is Amazon Safely ???
reviews.comment: What is Amazon Safely ???  When I use my Amazon login data and press your \"Amazon Safely\" it responds with: No Product Found!   I have over 30 items in my Wish list!!!   What gives?  SteveV
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excessive data consumption
reviews.comment: crap app consumed 1.97G in a week. at least it should have put some warnings
reviews.author: Kevin Zhang

reviews.title: This tool is great!!
reviews.comment: Especially it now can also show the shipping price at Amazon. Just save major money on electronics!!
reviews.author: A Google User
